name: Animal Humane Association
about: The state leading non-profit animal welfare organization.
mission: Support and improve the lives of New Mexico's cats and dogs through sheltering, adoptions, humane education and veterinary services.

opportunities.title: Animal walker
opportunities.name: Animal walker
opportunities.description: We need an active person to walk dogs multiple times a week.
opportunities.neededSkill: Sporty and not afraid of big dogs

name: FIFABQ
mission: We support social empowerment through the growing and sharing of fresh food.

name: New Mexico Kids Matter
about: We advocate for the best interest of abused and neglected children.

name: Meals on Wheels
about: Nourishing bodies and spirits with balanced meals and friendship.
mission: We provide our services to any one of any age. There are no restrictions for age or disability. We help you or your loved one stay happy, healthy and independent.
